meaning: You can independently handle well-defined UX problems with guidance on complex strategy.
dayToDayReality: Designs feature-level flows with PM/lead direction.
Uses design systems and patterns to ship consistently.
Participates in usability testing and applies insights.
Collaborates closely with devs during implementation and QA.
Works on multiple features simultaneously with some autonomy.
commonMistakes: Treating business, tech, and UX as separate instead of integrated.
Doing research occasionally instead of as a habit.
Designing only for the happy path and missing edge cases.
Not connecting design decisions to metrics or outcomes.
nextGrowthFocus: Take ownership of end-to-end flows, not just isolated screens.
Actively connect metrics, user insights, and design decisions.
Start mentoring juniors in smaller areas (e.g., visual polish or flows).
Build deeper expertise in one or two categories (research, strategy, or systems).
